    ALS

    public static class ALS.UncompressedInBlock<ID>
extends Object
    A block of (srcId, dstEncodedIndex, rating) tuples stored in primitive arrays.

      • compress

        public ALS.InBlock<ID> compress()
        Compresses the block into an ALS.InBlock. The algorithm is the same as converting a sparse matrix from coordinate list (COO) format into compressed sparse column (CSC) format. Sorting is done using Spark's built-in Timsort to avoid generating too many objects.
